#summary En slags sandkasse, hvor viden er lidt spredt

==Konstruktions mæssigt==
[http://www.summet.com/blog/] - En DIY CNC

[http://code.google.com/p/acehigh/wiki/Konstruktion Internt link til konstruktions sektionen]

[http://www.instructables.com/id/Easy-to-Build-Desk-Top-3-Axis-CNC-Milling-Machine/] - En lille xyz CNC maskine

==Hardware==
[http://www.captain.at/electronic-atmega-mmc.php] - Hukommelses problemerne er løst

[http://www.captain.at/electronic-atmega-sd-card.php] - Og hvordan man får MMC interfacet til at virke med SD

[http://www.scienceprog.com/high-capacity-multimedia-cards-in-embedded-systems/] - Kort om virkemåden af MMC / SD kort i indlejrede systemer

[http://www.avrfreaks.net/index.php?name=PNphpBB2&file=viewtopic&t=66846] - Getting SD/MMC card working painlessly with FatFS  

==Software==
[http://www.learnsvg.com] og [http://w3schools.com/svg] - steder for information om at skrive SVG

[http://hydraraptor.blogspot.com/2007_04_01_archive.html]

[http://www.linuxcnc.org/] - [...] software system for computer control of machine tools such as milling machines, cutting machines, robots, hexapods, etc. EMC2 is Free software released under the terms of the GNU GPL (General Public License).

[http://pcbgcode.org/file.php/15/25/how-pcb-gcode-works.pdf] - PCB-GCODE, hvordan den virker med Eagle Cadsoft

[http://www.sandisk.com/Assets/File/OEM/Manuals/SD_SDIO_specsv1.pdf] - SD-kort datasheet

[http://sourceforge.net/projects/efsl] - Library for filesystems intended to be used in embedded projects.
